dc_title_s: Novissima et accuratissima totius Americae descriptio
dc_description_s: 1 map : hand col. ; 48 x 57 cm|[See a similar map by U. Visscher]|Relief shown pictorially.|Decorative cartouche with indigenous people and serpents.|Note in upper left decorated with angel casting out Satan.|Shows California as an island.|Animals portrayed on North America.
